definition: to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: We learned that Sadat was now pressing King Hussein to join the battle.
sentences.chinese: 我們得悉薩達特這時正在力促侯賽因國王參戰。

sentences.english: After the death of Nasser, Sadat successfully become the third president of Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 納賽爾逝世後，薩達特順利成爲埃及第三任總統。

sentences.english: Egyptian President Sadat and Israeli Prime Minister Begin were awarded Nobel Peace Prize.
sentences.chinese: 埃及總統薩達特和以色列總理貝京獲諾貝爾和平獎。

sentences.english: One is called "We Are Postmodern" by Alka Sadat.
sentences.chinese: 一個叫“我們是後現代”的鹼性薩達特。
